mapper.update: update ESTATE_CODE_DETAIL set building_id = #{building_id},code_name = #{code_name},code_content = #{code_content},code_sequence = #{code_sequence},code_remark = #{code_remark} where code_id = #{code_id}
mapper.select: select * from ESTATE_CODE_DETAIL where code_name like concat('%', #{code_name},'%') order by code_id desc
select count(*) as count from ESTATE_CODE_DETAIL where code_name like concat('%', #{code_name},'%')

select a.code_id,a.building_id,a.code_name,a.code_content,a.code_sequence,a.code_remark,b.building_name from ESTATE_CODE_DETAIL a,ESTATE_BUILDING_DETAIL b where a.building_id=b.building_id and a.code_name like concat('%', #{code_name},'%') order by a.code_id desc limit ${m}, ${n}
select * from ESTATE_CODE_DETAIL where code_name = #{code_name} and building_id = #{building_id}
select * from ESTATE_CODE_DETAIL where code_name = #{code_name} and building_id = #{building_id} and code_content=#{code_content}

select a.code_id,a.building_id,a.code_name,a.code_content,a.code_sequence,a.code_remark,b.building_name from ESTATE_CODE_DETAIL a,ESTATE_BUILDING_DETAIL b where a.building_id=b.building_id and a.building_id=#{building_id} and a.code_name='部门' and a.code_content like concat('%', #{code_content},'%') order by a.code_id desc limit ${m}, ${n}
select count(*) as count from ESTATE_CODE_DETAIL where building_id=#{building_id} and code_name='部门' and code_content like concat('%', #{code_content},'%')
SELECT * from ESTATE_CODE_DETAIL WHERE building_id = #{building_id} and code_content = #{code_content}
